product_name: Kiehl's Since 1851Rare Earth Deep Pore Daily Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackThe Rare Earth Deep Pore Daily Cleanser is a daily deep pore face wash by Kiehl's Since 1851 that gently detoxifies and exfoliates skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsGently removes oil, dirt and toxins while helping to minimize poresExfoliates and softens with a non-stripping foaming formulaFor oily skin and normal skinKey IngredientsFairly Traded Amazonian White Clay: known as "magic earth," it has been used for centuries by native Brazilians as a stress relieving, detoxifying therapy; rich in minerals and extremely porous, it is known to help absorb excess oil and detoxify skinAloe Barbadensis: known to help soothe skinItem 2536611How To UseApply a generous amount to damp skin and gently massage in an upward and outward motion, avoiding the immediate eye area. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Use morning and night to reveal your freshest complexion.IngredientsAqua/Water, Kaolin, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Coco-Betaine, Acrylates Copolymer, Sodium Chloride, CI 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Solum Diatomeae/ Diatomaceous Earth, Phenoxyethanol, PEG-14M, Glycol Distearate, Sodium Benzoate, Aloe Barbadensis/Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Salicylic Acid, Avena Sativa Flour/Oat Kernel Flour, Tocopherol, Sodium Hydroxide, Allantoin.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a generous amount to damp skin and gently massage in an upward and outward motion, avoiding the immediate eye area. Rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water. Use morning and night to reveal your freshest complexion.

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: I have textured skin, black heads and large pores. This wash helps literally clean my face unlike others who claim to do the same for much more cost. I think it would be a little harsh on someone with gentle sensitive skin, but even with my picky skin I didn't get any reactions. I love this and I hope it stays around forever! I will use the mask twice a week as well and my skin has improved immensely. I moisturize with the ROC niacinamide cream which drenches into my skin and makes my make up look better and evens my redness out. I highly recommend this wash if you feel like you have some clogged pores and oily skin or if you want to use minimally to refresh !

reviews.headline: AMAZING GET RID OF ALL MY PORES
reviews.comments: I love this product!! I use this every nught and it makes my pores disappear. I will always repurchase this product! Definitely recommend!

reviews.headline: Wanted to love - Sensitive skin be cautious.
reviews.comments:
i tried this cleanser 2 times. the first, it was great and left my skin feeling clean w/o any adverse effects. 
the 2nd time was about a week later and i had an unexpected reaction to it. my cheeks and forehead began to BURN and felt imflammed.. when i rinsed this off my skin texture was raised and hours later still stings. i have not had any sun exposure or use with other new products. & i have never had a reaction to a product like this. its not worth the risk and is definitely getting returned.

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: Honestly this is the best facial cleanser I have ever used. It literally exfoliates your skin and makes your skin feel super clean. I had bad cystic acne and using this helped clear my skin. I gave it 4 stars because its pretty expensive!
One of the only face washes that work for my acne prone skin. Picked it up, and my skin has never looked clearer.

reviews.headline: Great face wash
reviews.comments: I recently purchased this face wash as I've been struggling with clogged pours and blackheads. This product is amazing! After just a handful of uses my face is softer and brighter. I would definitely recommend this product!

reviews.headline: New fave
reviews.comments: I have THE MOST sensitive skin. Everything makes me break out or desensitized my face, this made my face feel SO SOFT with no diverse effects. My new go to.

reviews.headline: Made Eyes Swell
reviews.comments:
At first I loved this face wash. Don't get me wrong, this did make my skin look nice. However, one day my eye swelled up so badly. And the sweeping lasted for about a week. I thought it to be a weird thing my body was doing. About a month later, my other eye did the same thing. After speaking about it with a coworker, she asked if I changed anything in my routine and I told her I changed face washes. She said to stop using it. To my surprise, I've had no issues since. 

My partner continued to use the wash as we thought I was having a weird allergic reaction to it (mind you, I don't have any allergies). Then, the same thing happened to his eye. And I'm not talking a little swelling, both of our eyes were almost swollen shut and I am too embarrassed to post a picture. So, I'm not sure what is in this product but it caused more harm than good. I wouldn't recommend.

reviews.headline: Amazing! Worth the money.
reviews.comments: I struggle with large pores and this cleanser is the best I have used.  It lathers up nicely but is very gentle.  It has a little bit of gentle exfoliant in it too.  Been using it daly and it does not dry out my skin.  I can definitely see an improvement in the size of my pores.

reviews.headline: I love this cleanser
reviews.comments: I have a tough time finding cleansers that bust through my oily skin without drying it out and this one does just that! I'm so excited about this cleanser. My face feels thoroughly cleansed without making it feel dry or tight. Even though it's exfoliating, it feels very gentle and soothing. After I cleanse with this I apply The Ordinary Buffet serum and it absorbs much better after cleansing with this vs other cleansers I've used. I could not be happier with this purchase.

reviews.headline: The Best!
reviews.comments: I have tried a countless number of face cleansers and this is by far the best! This has really controlled my acne prone skin! It has a very light exfoliator but is perfect for everyday use! I use this day and night and will continue to use it! If you struggle with acne, give this a try!!!

reviews.headline: Found my new permanent face wash
reviews.comments: I have average-to-dry, and somewhat acne prone skin. I have used several acne cleansers but tried this to give a deeper cleanse and I have not gotten acne since using this product, which is amazing. It doesn't dry out my skin and my face always feels super soft after use. Will be using this forever!!!

reviews.headline: Caused Breakouts
reviews.comments: This product did not work for me. It caused tiny little texture bumps all over my face, almost like a rash. It also doesn't feel deep cleaning at all. My skin would feel dry and tight after use but not necessarily clean. I always felt like there was residue left on my face after every wash.

reviews.headline: Great cleanser
reviews.comments: First time trying Kiehl's and this cleanser is awesome! I didn't think I liked it at first bc thought it dried me out but I guess it was doing it's job detoxing but after a couple of days the drying stopped. It helps with my daily oils and keeps my skin smooth, pores don't look as bad either! I use it every day and night.

reviews.headline: Great for blackheads
reviews.comments: Great product for skin that has blackheads. I use this with a soft-brush scrubber and follow up with the pore-minimizer solution. I only use it in the shower at night. This works great with my skin!! Defiantly worth it.

reviews.headline: Not my favorite
reviews.comments: I've tried it for a couple days now, I went from really clear skin to having bumps everywhere. I'm thinking I might have a sensitivity to it? It's weird because all of the other Kiehls products I've used have been amazing.

reviews.headline: Feels Clean after Using
reviews.comments: This is my favorite Kiehl's face cleanser. I just hope it can be slightly cheaper although this little bottle can actually last for a long time.

reviews.headline: Favorite
reviews.comments: Leaves my skin feeling soft by removing dead skin. I use this everyday in the shower with a cleansing pad.

reviews.headline: Leaves skin feeling refreshed and clean
reviews.comments: Great deep cleanser, but not too harsh to use daily. Works well to exfoliate and remove oils and makeup residue. Leaves my skin feeling smooth and clean.

reviews.headline: Great clenser
reviews.comments: Morning n night great clenser

faceoff_positive.comments: Let me just start out by saying that I am not one to write a review on a product, but I HAD to on this product, and I would be honestly DEVASTATED if they ever pulled this product off the shelf! I had purchased this product on a whim walking through Nieman's about 6 months ago, and I am delighted to say that it is one of my all time favorites that I can NOT live without and probably one of the most inexpensive purchases I have ever made for what it has done for me. I am a daily heavy makeup user, so I need a really good makeup remover. I use either a cleansing oil or a cleansing milk to break up all the crud I put on my face. Also, I have very oily and cystic acne prone skin, so all of that makeup does not help with my skin. So I try to be very diligent with cleaning my face very well every day. I have been an avid Proaciv user for over 15 years, but lately, I have been noticing that either my skin is building up a tolerance to it or my body and/or hormones may be changing (new decade in life) and it isn't doing the trick anymore, also the cost of it has added up over the years. So it was time for me to start the search for something new. So for the heck of it, I thought I would go back to the basics and just wash my face with my makeup remover and try this deep pore daily cleanser after it because I know that the makeup remover would not give me a 100% deep down clean and it also does leave a film. After about a week of sticking to that simple routine, I noticed a HUGE change in my skin!! My face, especially my pores, felt so clean and were getting smaller, my skin was not dried out and not as oily, my makeup went on a whole lot smoother and lasted a lot longer with less touch ups, and my acne was going away on it's own without any new flare ups! I could not believe it! Going back to the basics was all I needed. I recommend this to anyone and everyone. It's a good value for the price and you only need maybe a dime sized amount to wash your entire face and neck and the tube will last you for about 6 month! It is so worth it! Even if you aren't an avid daily makeup user like me, if you want a nice deep down fresh clean feeling after a long day to wash away all the dirt or yuck that is in the air that can build up in your pores or on your skin, this will give you the kind of clean feeling you get after getting a good facial! It's a must buy!
faceoff_positive.headline: Best Purchase Ever! No Regrets!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have been a fan of Kiehl's cleansers for about 2 years now. This was my first cleanser and I really like it at first. I switched to the Ultra Oil-Free Cleanser and loved it. I switched back to the Rare Earth Deep Poor to try it again as I love the masque from this line. I found that the second round with the Rare Earth cleanser was not as effective. Post cleanse is great but I find that my skin is oily not long after cleansing. The Ultra Oil-Free works much better with my oily skin. The Ultra Oil-Free combined with the Rare Earth Masque work wonderfully together!
faceoff_negative.headline: Not my favorite...

rollup.name: Rare Earth Deep Pore Daily Cleanser
